trailingComments.value:
*
 * `CenteredZoomState` is a timeline state that allows the user to browse the timeline by clicking on a track, and then
 * - moving down to zoom in
 * - moving up to zoom out
 * - moving left to move in time, after
 * - moving right to move in time, before
with a default to 44.1kHz sample rate

leadingComments.value: with a default to 44.1kHz sample rate
prevent annoying text selection when dragging

trailingComments.value: Apply new offset to keep it centered to the mouse

leadingComments.value: Apply new offset to keep it centered to the mouse

trailingComments.value: Example 1: Prevent timeline.offset to be negative
Example 2: Keep in container when zoomed out

leadingComments.value: Example 1: Prevent timeline.offset to be negative
Example 2: Keep in container when zoomed out
